title: Banana Chocolate Chip Cookies
ingredients: ['440g plain flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1/4 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '225g butter, softened', '200g caster sugar', '70g dark brown soft sugar', '2 eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '250g mashed banana', '350g plain chocolate chips']
